game.name: Sylva - Curse of the Demon Woods
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take the role of a nameless knight seeking repentance in a God-forsaken village in Sylva - Curse of the Demon Woods, a game about inner and outward exploration, chivalric action, featuring Metroidvania and Souls-like elements with a heavy focus on narrative and worldbuilding.
